author: Dawn Ferre

review: I was getting very frustrated with Google Chromecast in that it would work reliably on only one TV in my home. There is a maximum distance restriction of around 20 feet from your internet router with Google Chromecast:-((. I received my Fire TV Stick yesterday. It took only minutes to install. It also works great with dual band routers, which Chromecast will not. I am happy to report that I can now watch Netflix on my living room TV with the smoothest streaming video ever! The remote is a big plus, too. This device is a keeper!
